content.prompt: The work was created by manipulating which of the following materials?

choices.label: The bone of an animal considered to be a totemic species
Red terra cotta clay excavated from a sacred site
A difficult-to-carve mineral called jade, formed using precise sanding techniques
A hard sedimentary stone known as greywacke, shaped with stone tools

topic.text: 1.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
